COVID_19 (Tests for SARS_CoV_2 Antigen)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    94558-4 SARS coronavirus 2 Ag [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by Rapid immunoassay
    95209-3 SARS coronavirus+SARS coronavirus 2 Ag [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by Rapid immunoassay
